physical_appearance:This is a shaving razor. It consists of a retractable blade
 with a black handle. It comes with a black casing. The razor is quite rusty. The black case has engraved lines along the edges as a decorative design. The case is chipped and scratched along the surface
 especially at the top right corner.

context_8:armed forces
sgcool_label_text:A shaving razor from the archive of James Steele
 Royal Artillery (Field) who served in Malaya from January 1941-February 1942
 when interned as a P.O.W at Changi until his release in October 1945.
